Platforms

Copyright (C) 2005 IENT-RWTH Aachen

Special care was taken to make GENIAL portable across platforms.

GENIAL is not portable with Microsoft Visual C++ 6, neither with the Visual Studio 2003 Compiler.

Here a non exhaustive list of compilers those succeed in compiling GENIAL:

  • Intel Compiler (ICL)

    Intel C++ is the highly recommended compiler, and the one with which the library was mostly tested.

  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 - 2008 (VC8 / VC9). The latest service pack of Visual Studio 2003 (VC7.1) might succeed.

    Slower execution speed

  • GNU Compiler (GCC) 4.2 - 4.3.0

    Slower execution speed
